title: Associate
email 1:
Hey Pavel,

No matter how skilled your team is, unclear messaging always costs you.

Every vague question or request triggers more emails, calls, and meetings.

That’s client time you won’t get paid for and profit leaking out unnoticed.

We create whiteboard videos that turn complicated offers into simple stories your clients actually get.

If you’d like, I can put together a quick video script to get started.

If this isn’t a fit, reply NO and I’ll back off.

All the best,
– Trent,
Toon Theory
toontheory.com
